channel.title: Posts on level99cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on level99cooking

item.title: Chicken Dragon Bowl
item.description: Chicken Dragon Bowl servings: 2 cook time: 25 minutes Ingredients: Chicken breast...........1 LB Kewpie mayo..............3 tbsp Siracha..................1 tbsp Sushi rice...............2 cups Garlic chili sauce.......1/4 cup Soy sauce................1/4 cup Brow Sugar...............1/4 cup Rice vinegar.............1 tbsp Sesame seeds (optional) Cookware Rice cooker (Optional) Steps: Start cooking sushi rice in rice cooker (2 Cups) Dice chicken (1LB). Mix Soy sauce (1/4 Cup), Brown Sugar (1/4 Cup), Garlic chili sauce (1/4 Cup), and rice vinegar (1 tbsp), and diced chicken.

item.title: Thanksgiving Turkey
item.description: Thanksgiving Turkey This recipe should be started a few days before to allow turkey time to defrost. All Ingredients Turkey.............. 1 Garlic.............. 1 Head White onion......... 1 Chopped carrots..... 1 Chopped celery...... 1 Turkey stock........ 2 quarts Melted Butter....... 1 cup Baking powder....... 1 tsp Lemon............... 1 Sage................ To Taste Rosemary............ To Taste Thyme............... To Taste Salt................ To Taste Pepper.............. To Taste Cookware Pan Meat injector Tin foil String Roasting base Garlic.

item.title: Buffalo Chicken Cups
item.description: Buffalo Chicken Cups Servings: 1 Cook Time: 20 minutes Prep Time: 20 minutes Ingredients Shredded chicken.............. 12oz Softened cream cheese......... 8oz Ranch dressing................ 1/2 cup Buffalo wing sauce............ 1/2 cup Shredded cheddar cheese....... 1 cup Wonton wrappers............... 24 Blue cheese crumbles.......... 1/2 cup Steps Preheat oven to 375 degrees and spray muffin tins with cooking spray In a medium bowl, combine chicken, cream cheese, ranch, wing sauce and Â¾ cup of cheddar cheese.

item.title: Pork Loin Roast
item.description: Pork Loin Roast Cook Time: 8 hours Prep Time: 5 minutes Ingredients Pork roast/loin................ 1-4 lb Taco seasoning................. 2 Packages Light beer..................... 1 Can Medium salsa................... 1 Jar Dried pinto beans(rinsed)...... 1 bag Tortillas Sour Cream Guacamole Shredded Cheese Steps Put all ingredients into crockpot. Cover with enough water to cover the contents. Cook for 8 hours on low. Put on tortillas, cheese dip, sour cream, guac and shredded cheese.

item.title: Salmon Pokebowl
item.description: Poke bowl servings: 2 cook time: 25 minutes Ingredients: kewpie mayo..............3 tbsp mini cucumbers...........2 pepper rice vinegar.............1 tsp salmon...................1/4-1/2 pound salt scallions seaweed sesame seeds siracha..................1 tbsp soy sauce................1 tbsp sushi rice...............2 cups garlic chili sauce.......2 cups Cookware: Rice cooker Pan Chopsticks Steps: Start cooking sushi rice in rice cooker sushi rice: 2 cups Cut mini cucumbers into thin slices, put into bowl and splash with rice vinegar, siracha, soy sauce.

item.title: Zaxbys Kickn' Chicken
item.description: Kickin’ Chicken Servings: 1 Cook Time: 20 minutes Ingredients High Temp oil.........Enough to cover pan Chicken...............1 Breast (Cut thin) Ranch.................To taste Buffalo Sauce.........To taste Flour.................1/3 Cup Bread.................2 Slices Steps Coat chicken breast in flour Preheat oven to 400 (only if chicken breast is thick) Put enough oil in pan to mostly cover chicken breast Slowly place chicken in oil Cook on each side for 3 minutes or until golden and crispy Place in oven until chicken is fully cooked through.
